item.title: Israel categorically condemns the decision taken yesterday by the Jordanian parliament to erase all ...
item.description:
ğŸ¦ @IsraelMFA

Israel categorically condemns the decision taken yesterday by the Jordanian parliament to erase all mentions of Israel from its parliamentary records. This decision runs counter to the spirit of the peace treaty which has been maintained for over thirty years. It must be denounced by all who strive to build a region of tolerance and understanding.
